All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
Represents the board of the game, including scores, objectives, and uncovered cards.
Card
Represents an abstract card in the game, providing common methods and properties for all card types.
Chat
Represents the chat of the game storaging the messages.
ChatMessage
Represents a message in the game chat.
ChooseStage
ChooseStage class is a javaFx controller used to manage chooseStage stage Players here are able to choose the initialCard side and the secrete objectiveCard
ClientMain
Entry point for the client application.
Color
 
CornerType
 
Deck
Represents the two decks of cards used in the game, the gold deck and the resource deck.
EndGameController
EndGameController class is a javaFx controller used to manage endGame stage Used to display the winner or eventually winners of a game
Game
Represents a game session of CodexNaturalis, collecting and managing all the components and all the necessaries pieces of information related to the current state of the game
Game
 
GoldCard
Represents a Gold Card in the game, extending the abstract class Card.
GoldCardPointType
 
GoldParser
 
GuiApp
 
Hand
 
InitialCard
Represents an Initial Card in the game, extending the abstract class Card.
InitialParser
 
InitialStage
Initialstage is a controller used to manage the first stage that clients see.
JoinGame
JoinGame class is a javaFx controller used to manage joinGame stage
MiniModel
this clas serves as a local copy of the model on the client side it contains only the needed pieces of information and none of the model logic it is updated by the events, sent from the server, and for every update it calls the viewUpdate methods to modify the view
ObjectiveCard
Represents an Objective Card in the game, extending the abstract class Card.
ObjectiveCardType
 
ObjectiveParser
 
Objects
 
Player
Represents a player in the game with the associated nickname, password and color.
RejoinGame
RejoinGame class is a javaFx controller used to manage rejoinGame stage
Resource
 
ResourceCard
Represents a Resource Card in the game, extending the abstract class Card.
ResourceParser
 
RmiClient
 
ServerMain
Entry point for the server application.
SocketClient
 
StartGame
StartGame class is a javaFx controller used to manage joinGame stage
Structure
Represents the structure where cards are placed in the game.
Triplet<X,Y,Z>
Represents a Triplet of three generic objects.
ViewFactory
 
VirtualClient
Remote interface representing a virtual client in the network.
VirtualServer
Remote interface representing a virtual server in the network.
WaitStage
WaitStage class is a javaFx controller used to manage waitStage stage
